## FlyoutNavigationPolicy.(constructor)

Creates a new FlyoutNavigationPolicy instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(policy: INavigationPolicy<T>, flyout: IFlyout);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  policy | [INavigationPolicy](./blockly.inavigationpolicy.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The policy to defer to for parents/children. |
|  flyout | [IFlyout](./blockly.iflyout.md) | The flyout this policy will control navigation in. |
